headline: Infleqtion Appoints Karl Pendergast as Senior Vice President and General Manager of Quantum Sensing Solutions
summary: BOULDER, Colo., December 08, 2025--Infleqtion (the "Company"), a global leader in neutral atom-based quantum technology, announced the appointment of Karl Pendergast as Senior Vice President and General Manager of its Quantum Sensing Solutions Group. Pendergast brings nearly four decades of experience in aerospace and defense, with a proven track record of driving strategic growth and operational excellence across civil, defense and commercial markets. headline: BAE Systems secures $36 million contract to equip U.S. Navy submarines with Multifunction Modular Masts
summary: BAE Systems (LON: BA) has been awarded a $36 million production contract from Lockheed Martin to deliver Multifunction Modular Mast (MMM) systems for integration onto U.S. Navy submarines.
